title: IMF Annual Meetings & Civil Society Policy Forum Recognition
description: Recognized for outstanding volunteer contributions at the IMF Annual Meetings and Civil Society Policy Forum in Washington, D.C.

title: Youth Red Cross Excellence Award
description: Awarded for exceptional service and leadership in organizing blood donation drives, health awareness campaigns, and community service activities.

title: Equinox National Level Technical Symposium Award
description: Recognized for outstanding coordination and technical contributions at the national-level technical symposium.

title: Academic Excellence - 9.21 CGPA
description: Graduated with distinction in Bachelor of Engineering (EEE) with a cumulative GPA of 9.21 out of 10.
